item.text: Destiny had a most disturbing vision of the future. It spoke of the death of Beast, a victory by Apocalypse, and your having been betrayed by a teammate.
Aaah, tellin' the future's a bunch of hog wash. Nobody really knows what's gonna happen - at least not with me they don't.
I don' know 'bout dat, Wolverine. Down in New Orleans, I seen plenty a people do it, and day's usually right.
But she's talkin' about Beast dying! It can't be true!!
Rogue, I made the mistake of ignoring her predictions, and lost Genosha because of it.
Admittedly, this is disconcerting, but her predictions don't currently impact us. We are still planning on rescuing Beast.
But what if he croaks because we try ta save 'em? Maybe he'd be fine if we jus' leave 'em be?
You know better'n that, Cajun. We can't leave Beast in the hands of Apocalypse.
Yeah, yer right. We gotta risk it.
But what about her prediction of one of us rattin' the others out? Ain't we gonna do something about that?
An interesting point, Toad. But what would you have us do?
'ow should I know? You're the one with the big brain, you figure it out.
All we can do is be vigilant and report anything out of the ordinary.
Oh, I intend on keepin' both eyes wide-open fer trouble.
